mapper.select: SELECT NOTICE_ID AS noticeId, WRITER_ADMIN_ID AS writerAdminId, NOTICE_TITLE AS title, NOTICE_DETAIL AS content, POSTED_AT AS postedAt, UPDATED_AT AS updatedAt, UPDATED_BY AS updatedBy, NOTICE_STATUS AS noticeStatus, IS_MAIN AS isMain, PRIORITY AS priority, IS_NEED_PIN AS isNeedPin, VIEW_COUNT AS viewCount FROM NOTICE WHERE IS_MAIN = 1 AND NOTICE_STATUS = 'ACT' ORDER BY POSTED_AT DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT NOTICE_ID AS noticeId, WRITER_ADMIN_ID AS writerAdminId, NOTICE_TITLE AS title, NOTICE_DETAIL AS content, POSTED_AT AS postedAt, UPDATED_AT AS updatedAt, UPDATED_BY AS updatedBy, NOTICE_STATUS AS noticeStatus, IS_MAIN AS isMain, PRIORITY AS priority, IS_NEED_PIN AS isNeedPin, VIEW_COUNT AS viewCount FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_ID = #{noticeId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE (WRITER_ADMIN_ID, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_DETAIL, IS_MAIN, IS_NEED_PIN, PRIORITY, NOTICE_STATUS, POSTED_AT) VALUES (#{writerAdminId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{isMain}, #{isNeedPin}, #{priority}, #{noticeStatus}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE SET IS_MAIN = 0 WHERE IS_MAIN = 1

UPDATE NOTICE SET NOTICE_TITLE = #{title}, NOTICE_DETAIL = #{content}, UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt}, UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy}, NOTICE_STATUS = #{noticeStatus}, IS_MAIN = #{isMain}, PRIORITY = #{priority}, IS_NEED_PIN = #{isNeedPin} WHERE NOTICE_ID = #{noticeId}
mapper.select:
SELECT NOTICE_ID AS noticeId, WRITER_ADMIN_ID AS writerAdminId, NOTICE_TITLE AS title, NOTICE_DETAIL AS content, POSTED_AT AS postedAt, UPDATED_AT AS updatedAt, UPDATED_BY AS updatedBy, NOTICE_STATUS AS noticeStatus, IS_MAIN AS isMain, PRIORITY AS priority, IS_NEED_PIN AS isNeedPin, VIEW_COUNT AS viewCount FROM NOTICE WHERE (IS_MAIN = 1 OR IS_NEED_PIN = 1) AND NOTICE_STATUS = 'ACT'
ORDER BY PRIORITY DESC, POSTED_AT DESC

SELECT NOTICE_ID AS noticeId, WRITER_ADMIN_ID AS writerAdminId, NOTICE_TITLE AS title, NOTICE_DETAIL AS content, POSTED_AT AS postedAt, UPDATED_AT AS updatedAt, UPDATED_BY AS updatedBy, NOTICE_STATUS AS noticeStatus, IS_MAIN AS isMain, PRIORITY AS priority, IS_NEED_PIN AS isNeedPin, VIEW_COUNT AS viewCount FROM NOTICE WHERE IS_NEED_PIN = 0 AND IS_MAIN = 0
AND NOTICE_STATUS = 'ACT'
AND NOTICE_STATUS != 'DEL'
AND (NOTICE_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR NOTICE_DETAIL LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
ORDER BY POSTED_AT DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
